snippet: The company seems to embody many of a typical Wall Street investor’s desires: disruptive technology, larger-than-life founders and dazzling growth projections.
abstract: Tesla Motors raises its stock sale to $642 million, and figure could eventually approach $750 million; electric car company forecasts it will sell 500,000 vehicles annually by 2020, up from 50,000 in 2015; investor enthusiasm has been significant.
lead_paragraph: The company seems to embody many of a typical Wall Street investor’s desires: disruptive technology, larger-than-life founders and dazzling growth projections.

headline.main: Betting on a Smooth Ride, Investors Flock to Tesla
headline.print_headline: Betting on a Smooth Ride, Investors Flock to Tesla
